revised_title: A Comparative Crystallographic Study of Double Selenates: Potassium and Rubidium Zinc Selenates
tldr: This study investigates the crystallography and optical properties of double selenates, focusing on the salts containing potassium, rubidium, and zinc. The author presents a detailed analysis of the crystal structures, refractive indices, and optical properties of these compounds, providing valuable insights into their physical and chemical properties.
